text: "Valerie" is a 1982 single by English singer Steve Winwood. It was taken from his third studio album Talking Back to the Night. The song was remixed in 1987. The remixed version went to number 9 in the United States and number 19 in Ireland and the United Kingdom. Category:1982 songs Category:Steve Winwood songs
title: Valerie (Steve Winwood song)
